#include <iostream>
#include <stdio.h>
#include <string.h>
#include <math.h>
#include <vector>
#include <string>
#include <map>
#include <set>
#include <queue>
#include <algorithm>
#define lli long long int
#define pb push_back
#define mod 1000000007
#define pii pair<int,int>

using namespace std;
string str;
int dp[30],cnt[30],to[30];
int main()
{
    int t,i,j,a,b,c;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--){
        cin>>str;
        memset(cnt,0,sizeof(cnt));
        memset(dp,0,sizeof(dp));
        for(i=0;i<str.size();i++){
            j=int(str[i]-'a');
            cnt[j]++;
        }
        memset(to,-1,sizeof(to));
        int ans=-1,st=-1;
        for(i=26;i>=0;i--){
            if(cnt[i]==0)continue;
            to[i]=i;
            dp[i]=1;
            for(j=i+1;j<26;j++){
                if(cnt[j] >= cnt[i] && dp[j]+1 > dp[i]){
                    dp[i]=max(dp[i],dp[j]+1);
                    to[i]=j;
                }
            }
            if(ans <= dp[i]){
                ans=dp[i];
                st=i;
            }
        }
        while(to[st]!=st){
            char ch =char(st+'a');
            cout<<ch;
            st=to[st];
        }
        char ch =char(st+'a');
        cout<<ch;
        cout<<endl;
    }

    return 0;
}
